EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder to access the free Peer Mentorship Curriculum!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},
We wanted to follow up on our exciting news about LiveDifferent’s Peer Mentorship Curriculum now being offered for FREE!
[Image alt text: Neil Patrick Harris Mind Blown GIF] < http://tumblr.com/ >
Key Benefits of the Program:
- Build Authentic Community: Foster strong connections and a sense of belonging among students. - Develop Leadership Skills: Empower students with the tools and confidence to lead. - Encourage Personal Growth: Promote critical personal development areas such as empathy, resilience, and values. - Compassion Project: Culminates in a student-led project that benefits their community or a community abroad, reinforcing the importance of altruism and social responsibility.
Program Details:
- Sessions: Six one-hour sessions covering authenticity, empathy, growth mindset, resilience, values, and altruism. - Format: Flexible to fit your schedule and adaptable to various learning environments. - Materials: All training, videos, guides and follow-up resources are provided on our easy-to-navigate resource page
If you’re interested in taking advantage of this opportunity, click HERE < https://livedifferent.com/programs/circles/peer-mentorship-curriculum/ > to get started.
If you have any questions or need further information, please don’t hesitate to contact our Community Engagement Manager, Mary Anne Roy, at maryanne@livedifferent.com. She’s ready to assist you and ensure a seamless experience.
Thank you for your dedication to your students’ growth and development.
We look forward to supporting you with this exceptional program.
Warm regards,
LiveDifferent Team
